attributes.action: Write to the Queen and ask her to considermaking Julie Walters a Dame.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British public are proud of Julie Walters.  Her diversity continues to suprise her audiences around the world.  'A Short Stay in Switzerland' tackled a difficult subject from all angles and without Julie the story wouldn't have been carried forward as successfully as it was!

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
